A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, im shocked and angry. This was just so bad. As a true fan\, this was not the star wars we all were build up for in TFA. What about the KoR? what about Ackbar? Luke's character was so badly written I will never forgive Rian for what his interpretation of this universe is. So selfish\, not listened to the fans at all! Wow\, I hope the opening crawl for Ep. 9 will be \"forget what you just have seen\, we apologize\"
